amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for payment of legal fees and expenses to an individual or organization if they successfully sue the Federal Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 195 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used for the payment of fees and other expenses under section 504 of title 5, United States Code, or section 2412(d) of title 28, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 197 (Roll no. 85).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 197 (Roll no. 85).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A075) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
